Why Contact Stump Masters Jax?

Same-Day Service

Need fast service? We offer same-day and next-day stump grinding throughout Jacksonville and surrounding areas. Call us to check availability.

Free Estimates

Get your free estimate over the phone - just describe your project. No hidden fees, no surprises. Transparent, competitive pricing.

Veteran-Owned

Proudly veteran-owned and operated. We offer a 10% discount to all active military members and veterans. Thank you for your service!

Licensed & Insured

Fully licensed and insured for all stump grinding and tree removal work in Jacksonville, FL and surrounding areas.

Frequently Asked Questions

How quickly can you provide an estimate?

We provide free estimates over the phone immediately. Just call 904-408-2450 and describe your stump grinding project. For more complex jobs, we can schedule an on-site visit.

Do you offer same-day service?

Yes! We offer same-day and next-day stump grinding service throughout Jacksonville and surrounding areas, subject to availability. Call us to check our schedule.

What areas do you serve?

We serve all of Duval County, St. Johns County, and Clay County, including Jacksonville, Jacksonville Beach, St. Augustine, Ponte Vedra, Orange Park, and more. View our complete service area.

What payment methods do you accept?

We accept cash, check, credit cards, and debit cards. Payment is due upon completion of the work.

Have more questions? Visit our FAQ page or give us a call!
